resources.string: Basic Orientation ( dismiss on touch enabled )
microAdjustX and microAdjustY used to refine position
You can use \\n to create multiline coachmarks. Tap the coachmark to see a callback invoked when the message is touched.

This is a lazy,
good for nothing Button.
It does nothing and
just hangs out all day!!!
Use CoachmarkDisplayHandler to display a coachmark under a variety of conditions and/or for a limited amount of time ( flip tabs back and forth to see the difference in behavior ).
Display Once for 5 Seconds (click to reset)
Hey, Hey , Hey I am a callback, you touched the multiline message.
